nschultz.watcher.core

Interface DirectoryWatchable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleDemo_1, SimpleDemo_3
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface DirectoryWatchable
    The {@link DirectoryWatchable} interface should be implemented by any class which wishes to be notified when a directory change occurs.
    This interface has two methods. The abstract changeDetected method and the method failed with a default implementation. The default implementation of the failed method will simply print the stacktrace of the caught {@link IOException}.
    The {@link DirectoryWatchable} interface should be used together with the {@link DirectoryWatcher} class.
    Since this interface is a FunctionalInterface it can also be used with the lambda syntax.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Niklas Schultz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeDetected(ChangedFile changedFile)
      Gets invoked when a change in the directory specified in the {@link DirectoryWatcher} class was detected.
      default void failed(java.io.IOException ex)
      Gets called in case an internal exception occurred.

    • Method Detail

      • changeDetected

        void changeDetected(ChangedFile changedFile)
        Gets invoked when a change in the directory specified in the {@link DirectoryWatcher} class was detected.
        Parameters:
        changedFile - the file that has been changed

      • failed

        default void failed(java.io.IOException ex)
        Gets called in case an internal exception occurred. This could be because the {@link DirectoryWatcher} did not have access rights to the specified directory.
        This method has a default implementation which will simply print a stacktrace of the exception instance to the set error stream.
        Parameters:
        ex - an instance of the {@link IOException} that occurred while trying to watch the director for changes
